Posts.EditableText:
It says that if you want to make a gamebook use quest's gamebook feature instead of the real one. How do i use this "feature"? I searched but couldnt find the option to do so. 

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
It says that if you want to make a gamebook use quest's gamebook feature instead of the real one. How do i use this "feature"? I searched but couldnt find the option to do so.

Thanks.

using a Text Adventure (thus having the full quest software coding functionalities) while making it still look/feel like a Game Book:

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/samples/topic/4772/how-to-make-a-text-adventure-look-like-a-gamebook

(most of these guides/links are Pixie's, so big credit goes to him)

Posts.EditableText: Gamebook is a great feature available almost in all games, follow Mindfulness Techniques to handle stress in tough conditions.
Posts.HTML: Gamebook is a great feature available almost in all games, follow Mindfulness Techniques to handle stress in tough conditions.
